dict.acceptation: 假定；猜想，推测；认为；让（用于祈祷语气）；

sent.orig: Where do you suppose Tippy Toes wasand what do you suppose he was doing?
sent.trans: 你们猜歪脚趾他在哪儿，在干什么呢？

sent.orig: Suppose you were an idiot and suppose you were a member of Congress.
sent.trans: 假设你是个呆瓜，是国会中的一员。

sent.orig: I suppose a strong point is that I like developing new things and ideas.
sent.trans: 我想我有一个优点就是喜欢创新。

sent.orig: Suppose a user writes a slot which disconnects another slot from the invoking signal.
sent.trans: 假设用户写了个插槽，该插槽把另一个插槽从调用的信号断开。

sent.orig: I suppose, other languages will be available soon.
sent.trans: 我假设，其他语言很快将是可利用的。
